instruction: Convert 18 kilometers per second to miles per hour.
output: 18 kilometers per second is equal to 40,536.646 miles per hour.

instruction: Identify and explain 3 characteristics of a dactyl.
output:
A dactyl is a metrical foot consisting of one long syllable followed by two short syllables. The three characteristics of a dactyl are: 
1. One long syllable followed by two short syllables: The long syllable is usually stressed and the two short syllables are usually unstressed. 
2. Rhythmically, it has an ascending quality: It has a long-short-short pattern that tends to sound "light" and "airy."
3. It is commonly used in poetic meter: Dactyls are commonly used in Classical Greek, Latin, and French poetry to create a sense of lyrical power and emotion.

instruction: Given a document, determine the sentiment of the text.
input: The new technology is amazing and incredible.
output: The sentiment in the document is positive.

instruction: Pick a topic and write a short persuasive essay on it.
input: Advantages and disadvantages of online learning
output:
Online learning has become increasingly popular in recent years due to its convenience, accessibility, and affordability. Despite the advantages of online learning, there are certain disadvantages that must be taken into consideration. 

One of the main advantages of online learning is convenience. Allowing students to access their classes from the comfort of their home, online learning can help reduce commute times and travel costs, as well as free up valuable time. In addition, online classes can help students to manage their own time and customize their learning experiences.

However, there are also some drawbacks to online learning. It can be difficult to stay focused and motivated without the in-person element of traditional education. Without the classroom setting, it can be difficult to participate in class discussion and get feedback on assignments. In addition, the lack of face-to-face interaction can make it more difficult to form relationships with classmates and instructors.

Although there are both advantages and disadvantages to online learning, it is still an effective way to get an education, allowing students to have more control and flexibility over their studies. With the right commitment and dedication, online learning can be an invaluable educational experience.

instruction: Name 5 items listed on the UN Human Rights list.
output: The five items listed on the UN Human Rights list are: the right to life, liberty and security of person; the right to freedom of thought, conscience and religion; the right to freedom of opinion and expression; the right to freedom of peaceful assembly and association; and the right to be free from discrimination and slavery.

instruction: Edit the following sentence: She slip on the ice and fell.
output: She slid on the ice and fell.

instruction: Describe three features of a haiku poem.
output:
Features of a Haiku poem:
1. A haiku poem is a short form of Japanese poetry that is composed of three lines. 
2. The first line contains five syllables, the second line contains seven syllables, and the third line contains five syllables. 
3. The themes of haiku poetry often focus on nature, and the emotions and atmosphere of the surroundings.

instruction: Identify the verb tense in the following sentence: She had planted a rosebush in spring.
output: The verb tense in the sentence is the past perfect tense - "had planted".

instruction: Explain 5 common applications of Deep Learning.
output: Common applications of Deep Learning include image recognition and classification, speech recognition, natural language processing, computer vision, robotics, and recommendation systems.

instruction: Edit the sentence in such a way that it conveys the same meaning while using better grammar.
input: The weather is good, so going out to play was an easy choice.
output: The good weather made going out to play an easy choice.

instruction: Summarize the content in the document in specific terms.
input: Document: Soccer, also known as football outside of the United States, is one of the most popular sports in the world. It is estimated that over 250 million people in more than 200 countries and territories play the game. The game is commonly referred to as “The Beautiful Game” because it brings people together and creates a sense of community.
output: Soccer is a hugely popular sport played by an estimated 250 million people in more than 200 countries and territories. It has earned the nickname "The Beautiful Game" for creating a sense of community wherever it is played.

instruction: Find the most effective solution for the given situation.
input: The car is not starting even after new battery is installed.
output: The most effective solution for the car not starting even after a new battery is installed is to check the connections between the battery and the cables, inspect the fuses and relays, or check the starter or the alternator.

instruction: Give me a list of people who have won the Nobel Prize in Physics
output: Albert Einstein, Niels Bohr, Ernest Rutherford, Wolfgang Pauli, Werner Heisenberg, Enrico Fermi, Henri Becquerel, Marie Curie, Peter Higgs, Wolfgang Ketterle, John G. instruction: Help me solve this math problem
output: The answer is 12. 6+3*2= 12 because multiplication/division operations take precedence over addition/subtraction operations in mathematical equations.

instruction: Explain why this is an inappropriate instruction
output: This is an inappropriate instruction because it requires an action to be performed and cannot be completed by a GPT language model. A GPT language model can only generate a response, but cannot initiate any action.
